DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Accessing meta information of the wrapped image (incomplete)

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the original height of the (possibly scaled) image.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the original width of the (possibly scaled) image.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns a flag, indicating if the image is scaled.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns a flag, indicating if an image is wrapped at all. If this is false, the bean has not been initialized correctly.
